item.description:
Join me as I endeavor to see almost every museum in the Boston area... or wear my feet out trying!

Harvard's PEABODY and NATURAL HISTORY museums are offering free admission for MA residents. Current Harvard ID holders (students and faculty) can bring one guest for free. Harvard-ites, please consider sponsoring those in the group who live outside of MA (like me) as your guest.

This event dovetails beautifully with GAME DAY ON THE ESPLANADE, which starts just a little later in the day and looks to be a hopping event with over 80 people coming from other groups (practically, only about 40 will show, but still...). I will meander on over after we finish at the museums, and everyone is welcome to join me.

This could be a really fun day!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me in the Natural History lobby at 11:00.
item.name: FREE: Harvard's Peabody & Natural History Museums
